#labels AIR,Derby

= Introducing: BirdEye =

*BirdEye* is an Adobe AIR showcase application to demonstrate an open source visualization library known as *Visual Graph*.

*BirdEye* is a custom developed *Link Analysis* tool.  Link analysis is a method of exploring associations between objects. Link analysis provides visibility of the relationships and associations between objects of different types that are not apparent from isolated pieces of information.

The AIR application download for the *Derby* is available at http://flexvizgraphlib.googlecode.com/files/BirdEye.air
